title: Israeli operations cause Gaza telecom blackout, strikes in Lebanon
summary: Israeli tanks advanced along two gateways to the center of Gaza City on Thursday while internet and phone lines were cut off for several hours. In separate developments, Israel attacked Hezbollah military targets in southern Lebanon.

title: Poll: 2 in 3 Americans say harsh political rhetoric fueling violence
summary: Roughly two out of three Americans believe that harsh rhetoric used in talking about politics encourages violence while over 70 percent say that the "American society is broken," according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll conducted in the days following the killing of conservative political activist Charlie Kirk.
